para.text: IPRN—is a flag that indicates if the array being read should be printed (written to the listing file) after it has been read and a code for indicating the format that should be used when it is printed. The format codes are different for each of the three array-reading modules as shown below. IPRN is set to zero when the specified value exceeds those defined. If IPRN is less than zero, the array will not be printed. See
